## Quick Start

The **PyPottery Suite Launcher** is a standalone application that lets you download, install, and run all PyPottery tools from a single, user-friendly interface.

::: {.callout-tip}
## No Technical Knowledge Required
The launcher handles everything: Python environment, dependencies, and app management. Just download, extract, and run!
:::

## Installation

### Windows

1. **Download** the Windows package from the link above
2. **Extract** the ZIP file to a folder of your choice (e.g., `C:\PyPottery`)
3. **Run** `PyPottery.bat` by double-clicking it

```{=html}
<div style="background: linear-gradient(145deg, #f0fdf4 0%, #dcfce7 100%); border-radius: 12px; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 1.5rem 0; border-left: 4px solid #10b981;">
  <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">
    <span style="font-size: 1.5rem;">üí°</span>
    <strong style="color: #166534;">Tip</strong>
  </div>
  <p style="margin: 0; color: #166534;">
    You can create a desktop shortcut to <code>PyPottery.bat</code> for quick access!
  </p>
</div>
```

### macOS

1. **Download** the appropriate package for your Mac:
   - **Intel Mac**: `macos-x86_64` version
   - **Apple Silicon (M1/M2/M3)**: `macos-arm64` version
2. **Extract** the ZIP file
3. **Double-click** on the `PyPottery Launcher.app` file to launch the app

::: {.callout-note}
## First Run on macOS
The first time you run the launcher, macOS may ask for permission. Right-click on the script and select "Open" to bypass Gatekeeper.
:::

::: {.callout-warning}
## Don't run on Download
Download folder doesn't allow running the app. Move it to a different location (e.g, Desktop or Applications).
:::

### Step 1: Configure Environment

The first time you use the launcher, click **"Configure Environment"** to set up the Python environment. This installs all required dependencies.

```{=html}
<div style="background: #fef3c7; border-radius: 8px; padding: 1rem; margin: 1rem 0; border-left: 4px solid #f59e0b;">
  <strong style="color: #92400e;">‚è±Ô∏è First Setup</strong>
  <p style="margin: 0.5rem 0 0 0; color: #92400e;">
    Environment configuration may take 5-10 minutes depending on your internet connection. 
    The progress bar shows the current status.
  </p>
</div>
```

### Step 2: Download Apps

Click the **download button** (‚¨áÔ∏è) next to any app to download it. Available apps:

| App | Description |
|-----|-------------|
| **PyPotteryInk** | AI-based inking of pottery drawings |
| **PyPotteryLayout** | Create publication-ready layouts |
| **PyPotteryLens** | Data collection from PDF documents |

<!-- | **PyPotteryScan** | Digitize pottery plates with AI-powered OCR | -->

### Step 3: Launch Apps

Once an app is downloaded, click the **"Launch"** button to start it. The app will open in your default web browser.

## Troubleshooting

### General Troubleshooting during the installation

Remove the `pypottery_env` folder and try again.

### Windows: "Windows protected your PC" message

This is normal for new applications. Click **"More info"** ‚Üí **"Run anyway"**.


### Apps not downloading

Check your internet connection and firewall settings. The launcher downloads apps from GitHub.

### Environment configuration fails

Try running the launcher as administrator (Windows).

```{=html}
<script>
(function() {
  // Variables to store the target URL
  let pendingDownloadUrl = null;
  
  // Get the modal elements
  const modal = document.getElementById('kofi-modal');
  const continueBtn = document.getElementById('kofi-continue');
  const closeBtn = document.getElementById('kofi-close');
  
  // Function to show modal
  function showKofiModal(url) {
    pendingDownloadUrl = url;
    modal.style.display = 'flex';
    document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
  }
  
  // Function to hide modal
  function hideKofiModal() {
    modal.style.display = 'none';
    document.body.style.overflow = '';
  }
  
  // Continue to download
  continueBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
    hideKofiModal();
    if (pendingDownloadUrl) {
      window.open(pendingDownloadUrl, '_blank');
    }
  });
  
  // Close modal
  closeBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
    hideKofiModal();
  });
  
  // Close on backdrop click
  modal.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
    if (e.target === modal) {
      hideKofiModal();
    }
  });
  
  // Close on Escape key
  document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
    if (e.key === 'Escape' && modal.style.display === 'flex') {
      hideKofiModal();
    }
  });
  
  // Intercept all download links (GitHub releases links)
  document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
    const link = e.target.closest('a');
    if (link && link.href && link.href.includes('github.com/lrncrd/PyPottery/releases')) {
      e.preventDefault();
      showKofiModal(link.href);
    }
  });
})();
</script>
```
